import React from 'react'; import './employee_info.css'; {/* function showInfoLoop(){ const infoHead = ['No.', 'Full Name(TH)', 'Nickname(TH)', 'Full Name(EN)', 'Gender', 'Address', 'Private Phone No.', 'Company Email', 'Birth Date', 'Working Age', 'Department', 'Department Name', 'Section', 'Section Name', 'Position', 'Posiion Name', 'Job Level', 'Site', 'Site Name', 'Employment Department', 'Status'] for (var i = 0; i < 21; i++) { rows.push(); }
return {rows}; } */} function employee_info(){ return(
'No. 'Full Name(TH) 'Nickname(TH) 'Full Name(EN) 'Gender 'Address 'Private Phone No. 'Company Email 'Birth Date 'Working Age 'Department 'Department Name 'Section Section Name Position Posiion Name Job Level Site Site Name Employment Department Status
); } export default employee_info;
